description:
Update: 06/06/2022 02:42

- game is less gruesome (changed the assets for blood and bullet)

- sounds have been added to the game

- timer has been added - shows during gameplay and on the game over screen

- difficulty has been implemented

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update: 05/06/2022 03:25

- the game now has game states (menu screen, playing screen and end screen)

- the player can now shoot to the left

- the webpage no longer scrolls when using the up and down arrow keys

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer - this game is still in development so some issues will arise. Problems I plan to fix will be listed here:

- the player can't shoot to the left of them

- there are no game states so when you die, you have to refresh the page to play again

How to Play:

Use the arrow keys to the character around the playing area and try to survive as long as possible. Left click of the mouse shoots bullets that kills the enemies.

I have a google form that would be appreciated if you could fill out while playing or afterwards, that would be great :)  Comments are more than welcome in the comment section below!
